name: Drik Sarkar
position: PhD student at Iowa State University | IITKGP 23
about: I graduated with dual degree (B.Tech+M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. Currently, I am a PhD student in the College of Engineering (ME) at Iowa State University.

projects: [{"title":"AIRAVAT - The future of transportation","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"AIRAVAT is a student research group, funded by SRIC IIT Kharagpur, that aims to build an electric aerial vehicle capable of vertical take-off and landing, which can also run on land."},{"title":"Analysis of steel structures","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"‚Ä¢Analysed the cause of failure of AMTA shed due to the Amphan cyclone using Ansys (fluid-structure interaction).‚Ä¢Was provided with the drawings of the failed shed as well as the proposed new one, from the company.‚Ä¢Analysed the old structure in Ansys software and prepared reports of the results that it failed due to excess stress in the structure.‚Ä¢Also analysed that the new structure provided was strong enough to not exceed the tensile yield strength in 180kmph wind speed."},{"title":"Developing a multipurpose car ","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"‚Ä¢ Planned and designed a framework of a car, influenced by a buggy type chassis, using Solidworks software.‚Ä¢ Did Finite Element Analysis of the framework in Ansys; did any required changes where high stresses and deformations were observed.‚Ä¢ Built a 3D printed 1:10 sized Remote Controlled prototype of the car, which gave an idea about the dimensions and other plans of attaching a centrifugal pump, etc. in the car, serving various purposes in farming sector."},{"title":"Internal Combustion engines","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"‚Ä¢Completed literature review referenced to design topology and working analysis of Internal Combustion Engines.‚Ä¢Opened up an old 2-stroke petrol engine, cleaned and analysed its various parts and then put it back together to restart it.‚Ä¢In the end, a report was prepared comprising the findings and analysis of the anatomy and functioning of the engine."}]
